name: seams
description: Fast pre-computed live in-browser seam carving

scripts.build: npm run-script build-all-debug && npm run-script build-renderer-debug && npm run-script build-all-min && npm run-script build-renderer-min
scripts.build-all-debug: browserify -t babelify -i canvas lib/index.js | babel | uglifyjs -d DEBUG=true -mc > build/index.debug.js
scripts.build-all-min: browserify -t babelify -i canvas -i timer-decorator lib/index.js | babel | uglifyjs -d BUILD=false -mc > build/index.min.js
scripts.build-renderer-debug: browserify -t babelify -i canvas lib/renderer.js | babel | uglifyjs -d DEBUG=true -mc > build/renderer.debug.js
scripts.build-renderer-min: browserify -t babelify -i canvas -i timer-decorator lib/renderer.js | babel | uglifyjs -d BUILD=false -mc > build/renderer.min.js

author: Mark Kahn <m@vouchr.com>
